alert.note: Alert for Izard; Lawrence; Randolph; Sharp (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 17 at 4:29PM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Randolph, northeastern Izard, northwestern Lawrence and central Sharp Counties through 515 PM CDT... At 429 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Myron, or near Ash Flat, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Ash Flat... Black Rock... Lake Charles State Park... Horseshoe Bend... Highland in Sharp County... Imboden... Ravenden... Portia... Franklin... Ballard... Myron... Annieville... Evening Shade... Smithville... Williford... Powhatan... Center... Zion... Poughkeepsie... Eaton... MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
